content: galaxy coaster if you have any issues with this pattern please feel free to email me at craftyhookup@gmail com and i would be more than happy to help level easy yarn cotton kings twister if not using this any 3 - 4 ply would work fine hook 2 5mm size 10 cm stitches - magic loop - st - stitch - sts - stitches - chain - chain - slip_stitch - slip_stitch - single_crochet - single_crochet - double_crochet - double_crochet - decrease - double_crochet two together - dc3tog - double_crochet three together stitch notes - instructions written between * * are repeated throughout the round - anything written in bold is a stitch to be worked - repeat instructions between … for as many times as suggested in general notes - strongly suggest using a stitch marker to keep track of the beginning of the round - if they turn out a little wobbly blocking completely fixes this i block them with ironing starch spray begin with magic_ring r1 12 single_crochet into magic_ring pull tight slip_stitch to first single_crochet 12sc r2 chain 6 3 chs count as double_crochet *skip 1 space double_crochet chain 3* slip_stitch to third chain of chain 6 6 double_crochet r3 chain 1 *2 single_crochet in chain 3 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet skipping over chain 1 12 single_crochet r4 chain 1 single_crochet in next space 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 18 single_crochet r5 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next space 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch first single_crochet 24 single_crochet r6 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next 2 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 30 single_crochet r7 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next 3 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 36 single_crochet r8 chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next 4 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 42sc r9 chain 1 single_crochet in next 6 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next 5 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 48 single_crochet r10 chain 1 single_crochet in next 7 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next 6 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 54 single_crochet r11 chain 1 single_crochet in next 8 sps 2 single_crochet in chain
